targets.rawSql:
select count(*) as "Success" from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.test_id in ($TestId) and
ctr.test_result = 'Success' and ctr.service_type = 'WebexCloud'

select count(*) as "Failed" from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.test_id in ($TestId) and
ctr.test_result = 'Failed' and ctr.service_type = 'WebexCloud'

panels.title: Overall Test Result Distribution - Webex Cloud

targets.rawSql:
select ctr.test_type, count(ctr.test_result) from 
connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.service_type = 'WebexCloud' and
ctr.test_result = 'Success' and
ctr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ctr.test_result , ctr.test_type

panels.title: Successful Test Result Distribution - Webex Cloud

targets.rawSql:
select ctr.test_type, count(ctr.test_result) as "Failed" from 
connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.service_type = 'WebexCloud' and
ctr.test_result = 'Failed' and
ctr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ctr.test_result , ctr.test_type

panels.title: Failed Test Result Distribution - Webex Cloud

targets.rawSql:
select ctr.test_timestamp as "time", ctr.test_type,
case when(ctr.test_result = 'Success') then 1 else 0 end as "Test Result - "
from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id
where
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and 
ctr.service_type = 'WebexCloud' and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ctr.test_type, ctr.test_timestamp, ctr.test_result 
order by ctr.test_timestamp

select ctr.test_timestamp as "time", ctr.test_type,
case when(ctr.test_result = 'Success') then 1 else 0 end as "Test Result for ThirdPartyCloud:"
from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id
where ctr.trigger_type = 'Periodic' and ctr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and ctr.test_id in ($TestId)
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and ctr.host_name in ($HostName)
group by ctr.test_type, ctr.service_type, ctr.test_timestamp, ctr.test_result 
order by ctr.test_timestamp

panels.title: Connectivity Test Results Trend for WebexCloud

targets.rawSql:
select count(*) as "Success" from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and

$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.test_id in ($TestId) and
ctr.test_result = 'Success' and ctr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud'

where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.test_id in ($TestId) and
ctr.test_result = 'Failed' and ctr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud'

select ctr.test_type, count(ctr.test_result) as "Success" from 
connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and
ctr.test_result = 'Success' and ctr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ctr.test_result , ctr.test_type

select ctr.test_type, count(ctr.test_result) as "Failed" from 
connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and 
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and 
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and
ctr.test_result = 'Failed' and ctr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ctr.test_result , ctr.test_type

select ctr.test_timestamp as "time", ctr.test_type,
case when(ctr.test_result = 'Success') then 1 else 0 end as "Test Result - "
from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id
where
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and 
ctr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and ctr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ctr.test_type, ctr.test_timestamp, ctr.test_result 
order by ctr.test_timestamp

select ctr.test_timestamp as "time", ctr.test_type,
case when(ctr.test_result = 'Success') then 1 else 0 end as "Test Result for ThirdPartyCloud:"
from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id
where ctr.trigger_type = 'Periodic' and ctr.service_type = 'ThirdPartyCloud' and
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and ctr.test_id in ($TestId)
group by ctr.test_type, ctr.service_type, ctr.test_timestamp, ctr.test_result 
order by ctr.test_timestamp

panels.title: Connectivity Test Results Trend for ThirdPartyCloud

targets.rawSql:
select ctr.test_timestamp as "Test Timestamp", 
ctr.test_id as "Test ID",
o.organization_name as "Organization Name", 
ctr.cluster_name as "Cluster Name", 
ctr.host_name as "Host Name", 
ctr.test_type as "Test Type", 
ctr.service_type as "Service Type", 
ctr.test_result as "Test Result",
ctr.failure_reason as "Failure Reason",
ctr.possible_remediation as "Possible Remediation"
from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id 
where
o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and
ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and 
ctr.host_name in ($HostName) and
ctr.trigger_type in ($TriggerType) and
$__timeFilter(ctr.test_timestamp) and
ctr.test_id in ($TestId)

list.definition: select distinct organization_name from organizations o
list.label: Select Organization Name
list.name: OrganizationName
list.query: select distinct organization_name from organizations o

list.definition:
select distinct cluster_name from connectivity_test_results cd join organizations o on cd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')
list.label: Select Cluster Name
list.name: ClusterName
list.query:
select distinct cluster_name from connectivity_test_results cd join organizations o on cd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName')

list.definition:
select distinct host_name from connectivity_test_results nd join organizations o on nd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and nd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName)
list.label: Select Host Name
list.name: HostName
list.query:
select distinct host_name from connectivity_test_results nd join organizations o on nd.organization_id = o.organization_id 
where o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and nd.cluster_name in ($ClusterName)

list.definition:
select distinct ctr.test_id from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id
and o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and ctr.host_name in ($HostName)
list.label: Select Test ID
list.name: TestId
list.query:
select distinct ctr.test_id from connectivity_test_results ctr join organizations o on o.organization_id = ctr.organization_id
and o.organization_name in ('$OrganizationName') and ctr.cluster_name in ($ClusterName) and ctr.host_name in ($HostName)
